**“Load the MASS package”**
##Install the MASS package
```{r}
library(MASS)
data(shrimp)
```

**“The shrimp dataset”**
```{r}
shrimp
summary(shrimp)
str((shrimp))
```

**“Plot”**
##install the ggplot2 package
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
plot(shrimp)
```
